pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.1.3: “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.1.4: Taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.1.5: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.1.6: so imaṃ lokaṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.1.7: so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ; kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.1.8: sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.2.1: Atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi. Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.2.3: ‘na samaṇo gotamo brāhmaṇe jiṇṇe vuḍḍhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivādeti vā paccuṭṭheti vā āsanena vā nimantetī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.2.4: Tayidaṃ, bho gotama, tatheva? Na hi bhavaṃ gotamo brāhmaṇe jiṇṇe vuḍḍhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivādeti vā paccuṭṭheti vā āsanena vā nimanteti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.2.6: “Nāhaṃ taṃ, brāhmaṇa, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yamahaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ vā paccuṭṭheyyaṃ vā āsanena vā nimanteyyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.2.7: Yañhi, brāhmaṇa, tathāgato abhivādeyya vā paccuṭṭheyya vā āsanena vā nimanteyya, muddhāpi tassa vipateyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.3.2: “Atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—‘arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo’ti.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.3.30: “Atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya—‘tapassī samaṇo gotamo’ti.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.4.1: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.4.2: Tānassu kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitāni sammā pariseditāni sammā paribhāvitāni.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.4.3: Yo nu kho tesaṃ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjeyya, kinti svāssa vacanīyo—‘jeṭṭho vā kaniṭṭho vā’”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.4.6: “Evameva kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, avijjāgatāya pajāya aṇḍabhūtāya pariyonaddhāya avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā ekova loke anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.5.1: Āraddhaṃ kho pana me, brāhmaṇa, vīriyaṃ ahosi asallīnaṃ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.5.2: So kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.5.3: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.5.4: Pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca vihāsiṃ sato ca sampajāno, sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedesiṃ, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.5.5: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.5.6: Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.6.1: So evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmesiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.6.3: ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo tiṃsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi, jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi, anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.6.4: ‘amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.6.6: tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.6.8: Iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.6.9: Ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, rattiyā paṭhame yāme paṭhamā vijjā adhigatā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.6.10: avijjā vihatā, vijjā uppannā, tamo vihato, āloko uppanno—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.6.11: yathā taṃ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.6.12: Ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, paṭhamābhinibbhidā ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.7.1: So evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmesiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.7.2: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate, yathākammūpage satte pajānāmi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.7.3: ‘ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ upavādakā micchādiṭṭhikā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.7.4: te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.7.5: Ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ anupavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.7.6: te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.7.7: Iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate, yathākammūpage satte pajānāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.7.8: Ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, rattiyā majjhime yāme dutiyā vijjā adhigatā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.7.9: avijjā vihatā, vijjā uppannā, tamo vihato, āloko uppanno—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.7.10: yathā taṃ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.7.11: Ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, dutiyābhinibbhidā ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.8.1: So evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmesiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.8.2: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.8.3: ‘ime āsavā’ti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, ‘ayaṃ āsavasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, ‘ayaṃ āsavanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, ‘ayaṃ āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.8.4: Tassa me evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccittha bhavāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccittha avijjāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccittha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.8.6: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti abbhaññāsiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.8.7: Ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, rattiyā pacchime yāme tatiyā vijjā adhigatā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.8.8: avijjā vihatā, vijjā uppannā, tamo vihato, āloko uppanno—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.8.9: yathā taṃ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.8.10: Ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, tatiyābhinibbhidā ahosi—kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.9.1: Evaṃ vutte, verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.9.3: Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.9.4: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya—‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.9.5: evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.9.6: Esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṃghañca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.9.7: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gataṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.9.8: Adhivāsetu ca me bhavaṃ gotamo verañjāyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:1.9.10: Atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena verañjā dubbhikkhā hoti dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena uttarāpathakā assavāṇijā pañcamattehi assasatehi verañjaṃ vassāvāsaṃ upagatā honti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.1.3: Tehi assamaṇḍalikāsu bhikkhūnaṃ patthapatthapulakaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.1.4: Bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya verañjaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā piṇḍaṃ alabhamānā assamaṇḍalikāsu piṇḍāya caritvā patthapatthapulakaṃ ārāmaṃ āharitvā udukkhale koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā paribhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.1.5: Āyasmā panānando patthapulakaṃ silāyaṃ pisitvā bhagavato upanāmeti. Taṃ bhagavā paribhuñjati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.1.7: Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi na pucchanti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.1.8: kālaṃ viditvā pucchanti, kālaṃ viditvā na pucchanti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.1.11: Dvīhi ākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū paṭipucchanti— dhammaṃ vā desessāma, sāvakānaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmāti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.1.12: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi—“kiṃ nu kho so, ānanda, udukkhalasaddo”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.1.13: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.1.15: Tumhehi, ānanda, sappurisehi vijitaṃ. Pacchimā janatā sālimaṃsodanaṃ atimaññissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.2.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.2.2: “etarahi, bhante, verañjā dubbhikkhā dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.2.4: Imissā, bhante, mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatalaṃ sampannaṃ—seyyathāpi khuddamadhuṃ anīlakaṃ; evamassādaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.2.5: Sādhāhaṃ, bhante, pathaviṃ parivatteyyaṃ. Bhikkhū pappaṭakojaṃ paribhuñjissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.2.6: “Ye pana te, moggallāna, pathavinissitā pāṇā te kathaṃ karissasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.2.7: “Ekāhaṃ, bhante, pāṇiṃ abhinimminissāmi—seyyathāpi mahāpathavī. Ye pathavinissitā pāṇā te tattha saṅkāmessāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.2.9: “Alaṃ, moggallāna, mā te rucci pathaviṃ parivattetuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.2.11: “Sādhu, bhante, sabbo bhikkhusaṃgho uttarakuruṃ piṇḍāya gaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:2.2.12: “Alaṃ, moggallāna, mā te rucci sabbassa bhikkhusaṃghassa uttarakuruṃ piṇḍāya gamanan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.1.1: Atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.1.2: “katamesānaṃ kho buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.1.3: katamesānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.1.4: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.1.5: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.1.6: ‘katamesānaṃ kho buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi, katamesānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī’ti. Katamesānaṃ nu kho, bhante, buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi, katamesānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.1.7: “Bhagavato ca, sāriputta, vipassissa bhagavato ca sikhissa bhagavato ca vessabhussa brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.1.8: Bhagavato ca, sāriputta, kakusandhassa bhagavato ca koṇāgamanassa bhagavato ca kassapassa brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.2.1: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena bhagavato ca vipassissa bhagavato ca sikhissa bhagavato ca vessabhussa brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.2.2: “Bhagavā ca, sāriputta, vipassī bhagavā ca sikhī bhagavā ca vessabhū kilāsuno ahesuṃ sāvakānaṃ vitthārena dhammaṃ desetuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.2.3: Appakañca nesaṃ ahosi suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.2.5: Tesaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ antaradhānena buddhānubuddhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ antaradhānena ye te pacchimā sāvakā nānānāmā nānāgottā nānājaccā nānākulā pabbajitā te taṃ brahmacariyaṃ khippaññeva antaradhāpesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.2.6: Seyyathāpi, sāriputta, nānāpupphāni phalake nikkhittāni suttena asaṅgahitāni tāni vāto vikirati vidhamati viddhaṃseti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.2.9: Evameva kho, sāriputta, tesaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ antaradhānena buddhānubuddhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ antaradhānena ye te pacchimā sāvakā nānānāmā nānāgottā nānājaccā nānākulā pabbajitā te taṃ brahmacariyaṃ khippaññeva antaradhāpesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.2.10: Akilāsuno ca te bhagavanto ahesuṃ sāvake cetasā ceto paricca ovadituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.2.11: Bhūtapubbaṃ, sāriputta, vessabhū bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho aññatarasmiṃ bhiṃsanake vanasaṇḍe sahassaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ cetasā ceto paricca ovadati anusāsati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.2.15: Atha kho, sāriputta, tassa bhikkhusahassassa vessabhunā bhagavatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena evaṃ ovadiyamānānaṃ evaṃ anusāsiyamānānaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.2.16: Tatra sudaṃ, sāriputta, bhiṃsanakassa vanasaṇḍassa bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ hoti—yo koci avītarāgo taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati, yebhuyyena lomāni haṃsanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.2.17: Ayaṃ kho, sāriputta, hetu ayaṃ paccayo yena bhagavato ca vipassissa bhagavato ca sikhissa bhagavato ca vessabhussa brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.3.1: “Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena bhagavato ca kakusandhassa bhagavato ca koṇāgamanassa bhagavato ca kassapassa brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.3.2: “Bhagavā ca, sāriputta, kakusandho bhagavā ca koṇāgamano bhagavā ca kassapo akilāsuno ahesuṃ sāvakānaṃ vitthārena dhammaṃ desetuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.3.3: Bahuñca nesaṃ ahosi suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.3.5: Tesaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ antaradhānena buddhānubuddhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ antaradhānena ye te pacchimā sāvakā nānānāmā nānāgottā nānājaccā nānākulā pabbajitā te taṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ ṭhapesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.3.6: Seyyathāpi, sāriputta, nānāpupphāni phalake nikkhittāni suttena susaṅgahitāni, tāni vāto na vikirati na vidhamati na viddhaṃseti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.3.9: Evameva kho, sāriputta, tesaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ antaradhānena buddhānubuddhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ antaradhānena ye te pacchimā sāvakā nānānāmā nānāgottā nānājaccā nānākulā pabbajitā te taṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ ṭhapesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.3.10: Ayaṃ kho, sāriputta, hetu ayaṃ paccayo yena bhagavato ca kakusandhassa bhagavato ca koṇāgamanassa bhagavato ca kassapassa brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.3: Yaṃ bhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyya, uddiseyya pātimokkhaṃ, yathayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.6: Na tāva, sāriputta, satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti uddisati pātimokkhaṃ yāva na idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṃghe pātubhavanti. Yato ca kho, sāriputta, idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṃghe pātubhavanti, atha satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti uddisati pātimokkhaṃ tesaṃyeva āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭighātāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.7: Na tāva, sāriputta, idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṃghe pātubhavanti yāva na saṃgho rattaññumahattaṃ patto hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.8: Yato ca kho, sāriputta, saṃgho rattaññumahattaṃ patto hoti atha idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṃghe pātubhavanti, atha satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti uddisati pātimokkhaṃ tesaṃyeva āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭighātāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.9: Na tāva, sāriputta, idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṃghe pātubhavanti, yāva na saṃgho vepullamahattaṃ patto hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.10: Yato ca kho, sāriputta, saṃgho vepullamahattaṃ patto hoti, atha idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṃghe pātubhavanti, atha satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti uddisati pātimokkhaṃ tesaṃyeva āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭighātāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.11: Na tāva, sāriputta, idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṃghe pātubhavanti, yāva na saṃgho lābhaggamahattaṃ patto hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.12: Yato ca kho, sāriputta, saṃgho lābhaggamahattaṃ patto hoti, atha idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṃghe pātubhavanti, atha satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti uddisati pātimokkhaṃ tesaṃyeva āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭighātāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.13: Na tāva, sāriputta, idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṃghe pātubhavanti, yāva na saṃgho bāhusaccamahattaṃ patto hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.14: Yato ca kho, sāriputta, saṃgho bāhusaccamahattaṃ patto hoti, atha idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṃghe pātubhavanti, atha satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti uddisati pātimokkhaṃ tesaṃyeva āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭighātāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.15: Nirabbudo hi, sāriputta, bhikkhusaṃgho nirādīnavo apagatakāḷako suddho sāre patiṭṭhito.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:3.4.16: Imesañhi, sāriputta, pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ yo pacchimako bhikkhu so sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi—“āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ, ānanda, tathāgatānaṃ yehi nimantitā vassaṃ vasanti, na te anapaloketvā janapadacārikaṃ pakkamanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.4: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya āyasmatā ānandena pacchāsamaṇena yena verañjassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.5: Atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho verañjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā etadavoca—“nimantitamha tayā, brāhmaṇa, vassaṃvuṭṭhā, apalokema taṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.8: “Saccaṃ, bho gotama, nimantitattha mayā vassaṃvuṭṭhā; api ca yo deyyadhammo so na dinno.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.10: nopi adātukamyatā, taṃ kutettha labbhā bahukiccā gharāvāsā bahukaraṇīyā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.11: Adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.13: Atha kho bhagavā verañjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.14: Atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo tassā rattiyā accayena sake nivesane paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bho gotama, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.15: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena verañjassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.16: Atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ticīvarena acchādesi, ekamekañca bhikkhuṃ ekamekena dussayugena acchādesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.17: Atha kho bhagavā verañjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.18: Atha kho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā anupagamma soreyyaṃ saṅkassaṃ kaṇṇakujjaṃ yena payāgapatiṭṭhānaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā payāgapatiṭṭhāne gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ uttaritvā yena bārāṇasī tadavasari.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.19: Atha kho bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena vesālī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.20: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena vesālī tadavasari.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:4.21: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena vesāliyā avidūre kalandagāmo nāma atthi. Tattha sudinno nāma kalandaputto seṭṭhiputto hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.2: Atha kho sudinno kalandaputto sambahulehi sahāyakehi saddhiṃ vesāliṃ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.4: Addasa kho sudinno kalandaputto bhagavantaṃ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ nisinnaṃ. Disvānassa etadahosi—“yannūnāhampi dhammaṃ suṇeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.5: Atha kho sudinno kalandaputto yena sā parisā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.7: “yathā yathā kho ahaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, nayidaṃ sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ ekantaparisuddhaṃ saṅkhalikhitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.8: yannūnāhaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.9: Atha kho sā parisā bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.10: Atha kho sudinno kalandaputto aciravuṭṭhitāya parisāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho sudinno kalandaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.11: “yathā yathāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, nayidaṃ sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ ekantaparisuddhaṃ saṅkhalikhitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.12: icchāmahaṃ, bhante, kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.14: “Anuññātosi pana tvaṃ, sudinna, mātāpitūhi agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.15: “Na kho ahaṃ, bhante, anuññāto mātāpitūhi agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.1.16: “Na kho, sudinna, tathāgatā ananuññātaṃ mātāpitūhi puttaṃ pabbājentī”ti.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.4.1: Atha kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sahāyakā yena sudinnassa kalandaputtassa mātāpitaro tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā sudinnassa kalandaputtassa mātāpitaro etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.4.4: Sace tumhe sudinnaṃ nānujānissatha agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāya, tattheva maraṇaṃ āgamissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.4.5: Sace pana tumhe sudinnaṃ anujānissatha agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāya, pabbajitampi naṃ dakkhissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.4.6: Sace sudinno nābhiramissati agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāya, kā tassa aññā gati bhavissati, idheva paccāgamissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.4.9: Atha kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sahāyakā yena sudinno kalandaputto tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā sudinnaṃ kalandaputtaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.4.10: “uṭṭhehi, samma sudinna, anuññātosi mātāpitūhi agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.4.11: Atha kho sudinno kalandaputto—“anuññātomhi kira mātāpitūhi agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti, haṭṭho udaggo pāṇinā gattāni paripuñchanto vuṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.4.12: Atha kho sudinno kalandaputto katipāhaṃ balaṃ gāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho sudinno kalandaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.4.13: “anuññāto ahaṃ, bhante, mātāpitūhi agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.4.15: Alattha kho sudinno kalandaputto bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.4.16: Acirūpasampanno ca panāyasmā sudinno evarūpe dhutaguṇe samādāya vattati, āraññiko hoti piṇḍapātiko paṃsukūliko sapadānacāriko,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena vajjī dubbhikkhā hoti dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā, na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.5.2: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa etadahosi—“etarahi kho vajjī dubbhikkhā dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā, na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.5.3: Bahū kho pana me vesāliyaṃ ñātī aḍḍhā mahaddhanā mahābhogā pahūtajātarūparajatā pahūtavittūpakaraṇā pahūtadhanadhaññā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.5.5: Ñātī maṃ nissāya dānāni dassanti puññāni karissanti, bhikkhū ca lābhaṃ lacchanti, ahañca piṇḍakena na kilamissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.5.6: Atha kho āyasmā sudinno senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena vesālī tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.5.7: Anupubbena yena vesālī tadavasari. Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā sudinno vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.5.8: Assosuṃ kho āyasmato sudinnassa ñātakā—“sudinno kira kalandaputto vesāliṃ anuppatto”ti. Te āyasmato sudinnassa saṭṭhimatte thālipāke bhattābhihāraṃ abhihariṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.5.9: Atha kho āyasmā sudinno te saṭṭhimatte thālipāke bhikkhūnaṃ vissajjetvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kalandagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.5.10: Kalandagāme sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno yena sakapitu nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato sudinnassa ñātidāsī ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ chaḍḍetukāmā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.2: Atha kho āyasmā sudinno taṃ ñātidāsiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.3: “sace taṃ, bhagini, chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ, idha me patte ākirā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.4: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa ñātidāsī taṃ ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ āyasmato sudinnassa patte ākirantī hatthānañca pādānañca sarassa ca nimittaṃ aggahesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.5: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa ñātidāsī yenāyasmato sudinnassa mātā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmato sudinnassa mātaraṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.8: “Sace, je, tvaṃ saccaṃ bhaṇasi, adāsiṃ taṃ karomī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.9: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sudinno taṃ ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlaṃ nissāya paribhuñjati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.10: Pitāpi kho āyasmato sudinnassa kammantā āgacchanto addasa āyasmantaṃ sudinnaṃ taṃ ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlaṃ nissāya paribhuñjantaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.11: Disvāna yenāyasmā sudinno tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sudinnaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.12: “atthi nāma, tāta sudinna, ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.13: Nanu nāma, tāta sudinna, sakaṃ gehaṃ gantabban”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.16: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa pitā āyasmato sudinnassa bāhāyaṃ gahetvā āyasmantaṃ sudinnaṃ etadavoca— “ehi, tāta sudinna, gharaṃ gamissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.17: Atha kho āyasmā sudinno yena sakapitu nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.18: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa pitā āyasmantaṃ sudinnaṃ etadavoca— “bhuñja, tāta sudinnā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.21: Adhivāsesi kho āyasmā sudinno tuṇhībhāvena. Atha kho āyasmā sudinno uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.22: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa mātā tassā rattiyā accayena haritena gomayena pathaviṃ opuñjāpetvā dve puñje kārāpesi—ekaṃ hiraññassa, ekaṃ suvaṇṇassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.23: Tāva mahantā puñjā ahesuṃ, orato ṭhito puriso pārato ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ na passati; pārato ṭhito puriso orato ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ na passati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.24: Te puñje kilañjehi paṭicchādāpetvā majjhe āsanaṃ paññāpetvā tirokaraṇīyaṃ parikkhipitvā āyasmato sudinnassa purāṇadutiyikaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.25: “tena hi, vadhu, yena alaṅkārena alaṅkatā puttassa me sudinnassa piyā ahosi manāpā tena alaṅkārena alaṅkarā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.6.26: “Evaṃ, ayye”ti, kho āyasmato sudinnassa purāṇadutiyikā āyasmato sudinnassa mātuyā paccassosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.1: Atha kho āyasmā sudinno pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sakapitu nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.2: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa pitā yenāyasmā sudinno tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te puñje vivarāpetvā āyasmantaṃ sudinnaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.3: “idaṃ te, tāta sudinna, mātu mattikaṃ itthikāya itthidhanaṃ, aññaṃ pettikaṃ aññaṃ pitāmahaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.4: Labbhā, tāta sudinna, hīnāyāvattitvā bhogā ca bhuñjituṃ puññāni ca kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.5: Ehi tvaṃ, tāta sudinna, hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjassu puññāni ca karohī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.6: “Tāta, na ussahāmi na visahāmi, abhirato ahaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.8: tatiyampi kho āyasmato sudinnassa pitā āyasmantaṃ sudinnaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.9: “idaṃ te, tāta sudinna, mātu mattikaṃ, itthikāya itthidhanaṃ, aññaṃ pettikaṃ, aññaṃ pitāmahaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.10: Labbhā, tāta sudinna, hīnāyāvattitvā bhogā ca bhuñjituṃ puññāni ca kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.11: Ehi tvaṃ, tāta sudinna, hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjassu puññāni ca karohī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.12: “Vadeyyāma kho taṃ, gahapati, sace tvaṃ nātikaḍḍheyyāsī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.14: “Tena hi tvaṃ, gahapati, mahante mahante sāṇipasibbake kārāpetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇassa pūrāpetvā sakaṭehi nibbāhāpetvā majjhe gaṅgāya sote opātehi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.16: Yañhi te, gahapati, bhavissati tatonidānaṃ bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā ārakkho vā so te na bhavissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.17: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmato sudinnassa pitā anattamano ahosi— “kathañhi nāma putto sudinno evaṃ vakkhatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.18: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa pitā āyasmato sudinnassa purāṇadutiyikaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.19: “tena hi, vadhu, tvaṃ piyā ca manāpā ca. Appeva nāma putto sudinno tuyhampi vacanaṃ kareyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.20: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa purāṇadutiyikā āyasmato sudinnassa pādesu gahetvā āyasmantaṃ sudinnaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.21: “kīdisā nāma tā, ayyaputta, accharāyo yāsaṃ tvaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.22: “Na kho ahaṃ, bhagini, accharānaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.7.23: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa purāṇadutiyikā— “ajjatagge maṃ ayyaputto sudinno bhaginivādena samudācaratī”ti, tattheva mucchitā papatā.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.8.6: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa mātā āyasmantaṃ sudinnaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.8.7: “idaṃ, tāta sudinna, kulaṃ aḍḍhaṃ mahaddhanaṃ mahābhogaṃ pahūtajātarūparajataṃ pahūtavittūpakaraṇaṃ pahūtadhanadhaññaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.8.8: Labbhā, tāta sudinna, hīnāyāvattitvā bhogā ca bhuñjituṃ puññāni ca kātuṃ.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.8.10: “Amma, na ussahāmi na visahāmi, abhirato ahaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carāmī”ti.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.1: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa ahudeva kukkuccaṃ, ahu vippaṭisāro—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.2: “alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṃ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.3: yohaṃ evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā nāsakkhiṃ yāvajīvaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.4: So teneva kukkuccena tena vippaṭisārena kiso ahosi lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto antomano līnamano dukkhī dummano vippaṭisārī pajjhāyi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.5: Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa sahāyakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ sudinnaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.6: “pubbe kho tvaṃ, āvuso sudinna, vaṇṇavā ahosi pīṇindriyo pasannamukhavaṇṇo vippasannachavivaṇṇo;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.7: so dāni tvaṃ etarahi kiso lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto antomano līnamano dukkhī dummano vippaṭisārī pajjhāyasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.8: antomano līnamano dukkhī dummano vippaṭisārī pajjhāyasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.9: Kacci no tvaṃ, āvuso sudinna, anabhirato brahmacariyaṃ carasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.10: “Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, anabhirato brahmacariyaṃ carāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.13: tassa mayhaṃ, āvuso, ahudeva kukkuccaṃ ahu vippaṭisāro—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.14: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṃ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṃ; yohaṃ evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā nāsakkhiṃ yāvajīvaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritun’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.15: “Alañhi te, āvuso sudinna, kukkuccāya alaṃ vippaṭisārāya yaṃ tvaṃ evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā na sakkhissasi yāvajīvaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.16: Nanu, āvuso, bhagavatā anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito, no sarāgāya;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.19: Tattha nāma tvaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā virāgāya dhamme desite sarāgāya cetessasi, visaṃyogāya dhamme desite saṃyogāya cetessasi, anupādānāya dhamme desite saupādānāya cetessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.20: Nanu, āvuso, bhagavatā anekapariyāyena rāgavirāgāya dhammo desito,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.10.21: madanimmadanāya pipāsavinayāya ālayasamugghātāya vaṭṭupacchedāya taṇhākkhayāya virāgāya nirodhāya nibbānāya dhammo desito.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.11.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ sudinnaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.11.3: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, sudinna, purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”ti?

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.11.23: Tatonidānañhi, moghapurisa, maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, na tveva tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:5.11.24: Itonidānañca kho, moghapurisa, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyya.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:10.26.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro vuḍḍhapabbajito bhikkhu purāṇadutiyikāya dassanaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:10.27.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu araññe viharati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj1:10.27.2: Migapotako tassa passāvaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā passāvaṃ pivanto mukhena aṅgajātaṃ aggahesi.
